channel.title: Medium xp rate. 317 Economy and PVM server
channel.description:
[center][size=5]Features[/size][/center] [size=5]Small info:[/size]
Fully working farming skill. Every skill will make you cash (except firemaking) Great economy! (Armors/Weapons shops up to Addy, Monsters drops your stuff or you can make yourself) Working GE! (Grand Exchange is our economy gear without GE our server Eco would be ruined) Crystal Key chest. Really good combat formulas (can't say its perfect because just RuneScape have them hehe)
[size=5]Training:[/size] We have 5 fully working dungeons: Varrock sewers. Taverly Dungeon Asgarnia Dungeon. Slayer Tower. Giants Island.
also while training you can make some cash or get your starting gear.
[size=5]Bosses:[/size] Over 10 Bosses: (i will add in future 5 more!) King Black dragon Tormented dragon. Bandos. Armadyl. Saradomin. Zamorak. Chaos Elemental. Dagganoth kings. Corporal Beast. Nomad.
[size=5]Minigames:[/size] Every week we run automatic 1x1 event from all players. Winner get Hero status and Death cape for 1 week (till next 1x1 event). Perfect Drop party room. Duel arena with rules. Barrows (costume mini game) Castle Wars (Comming soon. Done 70%) Random item minigame. All server every 3 hours get random item to make/craft for double xp!
[size=5]Xp rates:[/size] Combat 100x Skills 50x
We know its quite low xp rates. But whats the point to reach 99 in 5minutes and have HighScores?
[size=5]Prestige system:[/size] Also we have prestige system which allow you to reach 135 max skill level! How prestige work? We have 2 prestige types: Combat and Skilling. To get Combat prestige you need to train 99 level (in: strengh,attack,defence,range,magic,prayer,hitpoints) + your prestige lvl. ETC: You have 0prestige. To reach 1 prestige you need to train all your combat skills to 99. if you have already 1 prestige now you must train all your combat skills to 100! and thats how works till 135level. Same with skilling prestige but you must train non combat skills instead combat skills.
Also every skilling prestige you unlock new item to make. Etc from 1 prestige you can make extreme potions.
[SIZE=3]Our Facebook page: [/SIZE] [url=https://www.facebook.com/officialTibikra]https://www.facebook.com/officialTibikra[/url] [SIZE=3]Our website:[/SIZE] [url=http://www.tibikra.net]www.tibikra.net[/url] [size=5]Server started June 23 day! (~40online)[/size] [center][size=4]Media[/size][/center] [size=4][b]Starter:[/b][/size] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/Starter.PNG[/img]
[size=4][b]Shops:[/b][/size] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/output_j30jHy.gif[/img]
[size=4][b]Grand Exchange:[/b][/size] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/ge3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/Ge1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/GE.png[/img] [size=4][b]Random Photo[/b][/size] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/474Frame.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/Agility.png[/img][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/NameChange.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/event.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/Prestige.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/random.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/Shadows.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/Zogres.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27960731/Ogre.png[/img] [SIZE=3]Our Facebook page: [/SIZE] [url=https://www.facebook.com/officialTibikra]https://www.facebook.com/officialTibikra[/url] [SIZE=3]Our website:[/SIZE] [url=http://www.tibikra.net]www.tibikra.net[/url]

item.title: Medium xp rate. 317 Economy and PVM server
item.dc:creator: @shapaklekas shapaklekas
item.description:
@shapaklekas wrote:

[center][size=5]Features[/size][/center]
[size=5]Small info:[/size]

Fully working farming skill.
Every skill will make you cash (except firemaking)
Great economy! (Armors/Weapons shops up to Addy, Monsters drops your stuff or you can make yourself)
Working GE! (Grand Exchange is our economy gear without GE our server Eco would be ruined)
Crystal Key chest.
Really good combat formulas (canâ€™t say its perfect because just RuneScape have them hehe)

[size=5]Training:[/size]
We have 5 fully working dungeons:
Varrock sewers.
Taverly Dungeon
Asgarnia Dungeon.
Slayer Tower.
Giants Island.

also while training you can make some cash or get your starting gear.

[size=5]Bosses:[/size]
Over 10 Bosses: (i will add in future 5 more!)
King Black dragon
Tormented dragon.
Bandos.
Armadyl.
Saradomin.
Zamorak.
Chaos Elemental.
Dagganoth kings.
Corporal Beast.
Nomad.

[size=5]Minigames:[/size]
Every week we run automatic 1x1 event from all players. Winner get Hero status and Death cape for 1 week (till next 1x1 event).
Perfect Drop party room.
Duel arena with rules.
Barrows (costume mini game)
Castle Wars (Comming soon. Done 70%)
Random item minigame. All server every 3 hours get random item to make/craft for double xp!

[size=5]Xp rates:[/size]
Combat 100x
Skills 50x

We know its quite low xp rates. But whats the point to reach 99 in 5minutes and have HighScores?

[size=5]Prestige system:[/size]
Also we have prestige system which allow you to reach 135 max skill level!
How prestige work?
We have 2 prestige types: Combat and Skilling.
To get Combat prestige you need to train 99 level (in: strengh,attack,defence,range,magic,prayer,hitpoints) + your prestige lvl.
ETC:
You have 0prestige. To reach 1 prestige you need to train all your combat skills to 99.
if you have already 1 prestige now you must train all your combat skills to 100!
and thats how works till 135level.
Same with skilling prestige but you must train non combat skills instead combat skills.

Also every skilling prestige you unlock new item to make. Etc from 1 prestige you can make extreme potions.
